nodes.text: Altapi T'mman was a female pilot who served with the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War as the captain of a CR90 corvette.

In 1 ABY, she was involved in a plan to gain the Alliance more secrecy. The operation involved the Alliance sacrificing three of its Corellian Corvettes by masquerading them as an expeditionary force trying to retake Dantooine, where they engaged a TIE/LN starfighter squadron. The ships were operating with skeleton crews, and after the battle all their captains were accounted for—except for T'mman. Her escape pod had crashed, and her leg was injured, leaving her unable to make contact with the Alliance. She was rescued and escorted to safety by a spacer sent by Mon Mothma.

Altapi T'mman was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, as part of the Rebel Themepark quest series. She was removed from the game with the introduction of Chapter 6: Masters of the Wild in May of 2007, when the Rebel Themepark was replaced with a new series of quests.

Due to the nature of many older quests in Star Wars Galaxies, the gender, species, and appearance of T'mman changed each time a player performed this quest. Therefore, it is impossible to verify the canonical species of T'mman. However, the quest dialogue given by Mon Mothma indicated that Altapi T'mman was a female.
